reporting-org.narrative: King Salman Humanitarian Aid and Relief Centre

title.narrative: Operating an ambulance service in Lebanon.

description.narrative: 1 Raise the readiness of services and ambulance transport through the transfer of patients and injured to and from hospitals and contribute to saving their lives and rapid intervention and reduce mortality. 2. To support the resilience of the host country to refugees in services and ambulance transport and contribute to alleviate the pressure in the side of ambulance services, and the disbursement of staff salaries and operating costs for one year.
Operation of the Ambulance Service Association to provide ambulance services to the needy in Lebanon, Syrian refugees or other ambulance cases served by Ambulance Association.

participating-org.narrative: King Salman Humanitarian Aid and Relief Centre
